ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Nutrient Solution
ResearchProjectDef.description: A bottle of suspicious liquid more efficient and nastier than nutrient paste meals. Artificial flavouring agents cannot mask its unpleasant flavors. Annelitrices won't mind it at all, as they grow up in it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Growth Factor Cocktails
ResearchProjectDef.description: A drug made of mysterious technology to revive only Annelitrices. Nobody knows what solvent is used to dissolve the nutrient of a calf in a volume of a syringe.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Incubator
ResearchProjectDef.description:
A structure to house Annelitrice worms. Need nutrient solution as fuel to feed the worms, so that they can produce Evolution Points.

"Why are we spending such efforts and resources for these slimy worms while our own people are still living in barracks?"

"Shush! Just keep your mouth shut for your own good. They are very sensitive creatures."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anneli Puppet Theatre
ResearchProjectDef.description: Puppetry is a form of theatre or performance that involves the manipulation of puppets. It basically works as a TV for medieval society. Additionally, it gives your colonists an opportunity to reproduce the plots and costumes of some famous works by an unknown movie producer.
